sources.title: Latest imported feed items on ArmchairCelts

articles.description:
Celtic have been clearing the deck for the next stage of Ange Postecoglou’s Parkhead tenure. We now count TWELVE players who have move out of the club this summer with only three loans among them. It was always going to be the case there would be more outgoings than incomings after the upheaval the summer […]
Source
articles.title: Celtic’s Summer Exit Tally Reaches 12

articles.description: BLUNDER Bhoy Boli Bolingoli has left Celtic on a permanent deal to return to Belgium with Mechelen. The frozen-out left-back, who made only two first-team appearances for Ange Postecoglou, has gone after playing only 31 games since his £3million arrival from Austrian outfit Rapid Vienna in the summer of 2019, according to a report on [...]
articles.title: BYE BYE BLUNDER BHOY BOLI

articles.description: Celtic have held internal talks over Argentinos Juniors midfielder Fausto Vera and updates could be imminent in the ‘coming days’, according to journalist Fraser Fletcher. The Lowdown: Vera impresses in homeland The 22-year-old has matured into a key player for his current side, impressing in a defensive midfield role and winning eight caps for Argentina’s […]
articles.title: 'Coming days...' - Celtic hold internal discussions over another South American signing

articles.description:
Boli Bolingoli has signed for Belgian top-flight side KV Mechelen on a two-year contract, ending his spell at Celtic for good. Bolingoli was signed by Neil Lennon in 2019 but was rarely convincing and ultimately fell foul of the club’s Covid-19 restrictions in 2020. He never really recovered from that hidden trip to Spain after ...
The post Boli Bolingoli speaks after permanent Celtic exit; Mechelen explain signing to fans appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Boli Bolingoli speaks after permanent Celtic exit; Mechelen explain signing to fans

articles.description:
Boli Bolingoli has finally left Celtic on a permanent basis. The club announced on Tuesday afternoon the defender has moved to Belgian side Mechelen. Boli was signed under Neil Lennon and had an ok first season. The following campaign would be a disaster for Boli and Celtic. The pandemic hit and football as we know […]
Source
articles.title: Confirmed: Boli Bolingoli Permanent Celtic Exit

articles.description:
We all know about the transfer work being done by Celtic this summer. Cameron Carter-Vickers, Jota, Alexandro Bernabei and Ben Siegrist have all signed up, bringing a total spend beyond £15m. Work continues behind the scenes with a belief that the club are looking to bring in a midfielder and a defender at least, with ...
The post Scottish Premiership rivals ramp up transfer work as Celtic prepare to defend title appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Scottish Premiership rivals ramp up transfer work as Celtic prepare to defend title

articles.description: Since the story about our “interest” in Fausto Vera broke, I have been waiting on two things; a confirmed bid from Celtic, or someone at Celtic confirming that we were ready to make one. None of these things has happened. The Vera story remains something that our media got from somewhere else, and ran as […]
articles.title: In Spite Of The Headlines, Celtic Never Confirmed Any Interest In Fausto Vera.

articles.description:
FAUSTO VERA has been linked with a move to Celtic for the past couple of weeks. The Argentine Defensive midfielder looks destined to leave this current club Argentines Junior. Reports in recent days claim Fausto has been on a list of potential signings at Celtic Park but no contact has been made between the two […]
Source
articles.title: Report: Celtic Target Subject to €6m Bid Elsewehere

articles.description:
Banik Ostrava manager Pavel Vrba says the upcoming clash against Celtic will be the highlight of their summer preparations for the new season. Vrba has a long association with Banik but only returned to the club for his latest spell as manager this year after leaving Sparta Prague. The former national team manager is well ...
The post Czech boss says Celtic match will be his highlight of the summer appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Czech boss says Celtic match will be his highlight of the summer

articles.description:
If you think tomorrow night’s Celtic friendly away to Banik Ostrava will be a run-of-the-mill pre-season affair, think again. It’s shaping up to be quite the event as the club celebrate their 100th anniversary. The Czech club expect a big crowd at their 15,000-capacity stadium, with the ultras section sold out for over a month ...
The post Banik Ostrava go all out with plans for Celtic visit appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Banik Ostrava go all out with plans for Celtic visit

articles.description: When Rabbi Matondo signed for Schalke he cost them £11 million. This is the big headline number which some in the media has been promoting since Ibrox’s interest in him was made official. “Ibrox linked with £11 million winger” and all that. But Matondo is not an £11 million player anymore. Although he was. He’s […]
articles.title: Sevconomics And The Reality Of Signing An “£11 Million Player” For £2 Million.

articles.description: Celtic continue their pre-season preparations in Austria against Banik Ostrava. After Saturday evening’s 3-3 draw with Rapid Vienna, Ange Postecoglou will hope that his team will continue to get minutes under their belt as they get set up for a return to Paradise. English Championship side Blackburn Rovers arrive as the opposition on Saturday and Read More
articles.title: Banik Ostrava v Celtic: team news, KO time and where to watch

articles.description: What an idiot Hugh Keevins is. There are things stuck to car windscreens with a higher intellect. Celtic fans have long known this. This week, many of them are scratching their heads at his latest bizarre theory. The rest are just laughing at him. As he said the other night on the radio, expanding on […]
articles.title: Hugh Keevins Barmy “Fivers And Tenners” Nonsense Has Celtic Fans Laughing At Him.

articles.description: Celtic are ‘unlikely’ to sign Sweden attacker Jordan Larsson during the summer transfer window, reliable journalist Anthony Joseph has reported. The Lowdown: Celtic linked with Larsson move Ange Postecoglou is still working hard on making new signings at Parkhead this summer as his side prepare for an exciting return to the Champions League with two […]
articles.title: 'Contact with the Hoops' - Anthony Joseph drops significant Celtic transfer 'update'

articles.description: Aaron Hickey’s incredible £19m move to Brentford looks like an eye-opener for Italian football.  Bologna paid around 10% of that for the Scotland international two years earlier.  Now Hibs have accepted a £3m bid from Hellas Verona for Josh Doig, while Aberdeen have accepted a bid for the same money for Lewis Ferguson.  Scottish players of [...]

articles.description: MATT O’RILEY says that Celtic expect their rivals to come back at them stronger next season, but that will be irrelevant if Ange Postecoglou’s team play to their potential.
articles.title: Matt O’Riley expects rivals to roar back, but thinks Celtic will have too much for the competition

articles.description: THE movement of Kyogo has left many a defender dizzy since he burst onto the scene at Celtic last season, but his speed is such that it is often difficult even for his own teammates to keep up with him.
articles.title: Kyogo is even a step ahead of Celtic teammates says David Turnbull, as he relishes link-up with striker next season

articles.description: WITH the greatest of respect to MK Dons, the rise of their former captain Matt O’Riley has been a remarkable one over the past six months or so. Not only has the young midfielder become an integral member of the Celtic squad, but he may well find himself at the World Cup come the end of the year.
articles.title: Matt O’Riley aiming to cap off Celtic rise with World Cup place – with a little help from Morten Wieghorst

articles.description: JAMES FORREST is a player who, it would be fair to say, has sometimes split opinion among the Celtic fanbase during his long career at the club. For a winger, it comes with the territory.
articles.title: James Forrest not content with making up the numbers at Celtic as winger looks to become main player for Ange Postecoglou

articles.description: KYOGO has set himself a minimum target of 20 goals next season as he looks to wrest the title of Scotland’s top scorer away from teammate Giorgos Giakoumakis.
articles.title: Kyogo sets goal target as he vows to oust Celtic teammate from top of scoring charts
